name: Galactic Fighters (itch)
description:
Galactic Fighters Is a multiplatform sci-fi bullet-hell arcade game for those who love crazy games. Your aim is to survive all the 13 levels using a mix of powerful spaceships and awesome power ups in order to save the galaxy from destruction


NOTE: the version that you can download here is just a demo. For the full version, be sure to upvote the game on Greenlight!
